XII.ii.3.C.8.c
.
Determining Whether Self-Employment Is an Issue for Consideration
Use SSA’s MBR and income information on
VA Form 21P-8924
to determine whether a beneficiary’s self-employment is an issue for consideration if
a REPS beneficiary that is self-employed reports earnings that are above the exempt amount, and
the review period is during the initial or grace year.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section C - St. Louis Regional Office (RO) Actions on Claims for Benefits Under the Restored Entitlement Program for Survivors (REPS)
